experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
experience.description: • Lead AI-innovation initiatives in team, developed automatic data analysis chatbot using LLMs by maintaining data privacy, deployed as webapp using Streamlit.• With cross-functional team collaboration, replaced existing ASR with SOTA technologies to fulfil business SLAs - improved transcription quality, reduced response time. (technology - Nvidia, Whisper,wave2vec2, Azure - cognitive service, BlobStorage)• Built enterprise grade e2e voice analytic solution, designed & deployed NLP capabilities to enable call insights and contact center modernization - auditing agent's performance on certain guidelines, call summarization, call intent, keywords etc.Outcome - successful production release, unbiased auditing of 45k calls monthly within TAT, 28% efficiency gain, saving $100k/yr. (technology - AWS S3, speech recognition, NLP, LLMs, FastAPI, Docker, Git)• Built pipeline to retrieve open-domain query-specific answers - optimized latency by quantizing pre-trained models from huggingface.• Handholding of junior team members by guiding to up-skill & contribute to team’s success.
experience.description_html: • Lead AI-innovation initiatives in team, developed automatic data analysis chatbot using LLMs by maintaining data privacy, deployed as webapp using Streamlit.• With cross-functional team collaboration, replaced existing ASR with SOTA technologies to fulfil business SLAs - improved transcription quality, reduced response time. (technology - Nvidia, Whisper,wave2vec2, Azure - cognitive service, BlobStorage)• Built enterprise grade e2e voice analytic solution, designed & deployed NLP capabilities to enable call insights and contact center modernization - auditing agent's performance on certain guidelines, call summarization, call intent, keywords etc.Outcome - successful production release, unbiased auditing of 45k calls monthly within TAT, 28% efficiency gain, saving $100k/yr. (technology - AWS S3, speech recognition, NLP, LLMs, FastAPI, Docker, Git)• Built pipeline to retrieve open-domain query-specific answers - optimized latency by quantizing pre-trained models from huggingface.• Handholding of junior team members by guiding to up-skill & contribute to team’s success.

positions.subtitle: Tata Consultancy Services
positions.description: • Developed novel e2e DL-based solution to derive business insights from complex voluminous PDFs without human intervention - saved hours by automation (technology - OCR, object detection, layout analysis, retrieval, NLP)• Designed a domain-agnostic tool to extract tabular information for Q&A from PDFs - 25% performance improvement against open-source tools.• Published research papers in conferences like AAAI, CODS-COMAD.
positions.title: Researcher - Web Intelligence and Text Mining Team
positions.description_html:
• Developed novel e2e DL-based solution to derive business insights from complex voluminous PDFs without human intervention - saved hours by automation (technology - OCR, object detection, layout analysis, retrieval, NLP)

• Designed a domain-agnostic tool to extract tabular information for Q&A from PDFs - 25% performance improvement against open-source tools.

• Published research papers in conferences like AAAI, CODS-COMAD.

publications: [{"title":"Extracting Tabular data for Question-Answering from Documents","subtitle":"CODS COMAD 2021: 8th ACM IKDD CODS and 26th COMAD","date":"Jan 2021"},{"title":"Mining company sustainability reports to aid financial decision-making","subtitle":"AAAI-KDF2020","date":"Apr 2020"}]
projects: [{"title":"Fact verification and evidence finding from semi-structured tables","start_date":"2021","description":"Implemented BERT-backend model (TAPAS) to classify a complex natural language statement into entail/refute/unknown class based on the information given in a table. Fine-tuned the pre-trained model to achieve competitive accuracy on a standard dataset.Currently working on a knowledge graph approach to incorporate table relations for representation learning and complex reasoning."},{"title":"Complete NLP Pipeline for Sentiment Analysis","start_date":"2021","end_date":"2021","description":"Designed a pipeline that scrapes Google News articles, visualizes word cloud for text cleaning, performs sentiment analysis using TextBlob and generates summary using genism summarization techniques. Deployed the pipeline as PIP package."},{"title":"An end-to-end system for Q&A from tables contained in large PDFs","start_date":"2020","end_date":"2020","description":"Designed a domain agnostic system (QuATab) which processes large PDFs using OCR, automatically extracts tables without human intervention, recognizes tabular structures, parses natural language query and detects possible answers within extracted tables. QuATab outperformed two open-source tools (Camelot & Tabula) with large margin. Implemented the system as a web application."},{"title":"Knowledge-driven information extraction from Sustainability Reports","start_date":"2019","end_date":"2020","description":"Semantically analyzed ESG data reported by organizations in Sustainability reports. Detected Non-availability/Misinformation for ESG data governance."},{"title":"Non Linear, competitive, dynamic pricing optimisation system","start_date":"2018","end_date":"2019","description":"This system recommends optimal prices for large volume of products for online retailers so that the overall yield is maximised. The dynamic pricing is based on 2-level Deep Learning architecture for sales prediction for short term period."},{"title":"Large Scale E-commerce Sales Predictions ","start_date":"2018","end_date":"2018","description":"This project deals with analysing an online US book retailer’s E-commerce sales data and developing a sales prediction model for their 6 million books, using the last 14 months of training data that is robust enough to handle high rate of new SKU's introduction. Project resulted in approximately 4% margin improvement (approx. 3M USD) to the client."},{"title":"Scalable Content Based Image Retrieval (M-tech thesis)","start_date":"2017","end_date":"2017","description":"Designed a system that efficiently searches database (1 Million images) using some smart data structures, searching scheme (Selective Search), clustering algorithms like Kmeans++ , inverted index lists for indexing and retrieves the top best matches of the query image and also maintains the scalability."}]
